ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ispickval(UserType, 'Standard'), Not( REGEX( PS_Manager_EID__c , "[EHT]{1}[0-9]{6}" ) ), not( REGEX( PS_Manager_EID__c , "[U]{1}[0-9]{5}" ) ), NOT( ISBLANK( PS_Manager_EID__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: PS Manager EID should be either upper case E, H or T followed by 6 numbers or upper case U followed by 5 numbers.
